product_name: The North Face GTD Sleeveless T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: With moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD Sleeveless men's T-shirt has all the performance qualities you want for your fast-paced workouts in hot weather. FlashDry fibers dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Polyester wicks away sweat; natural particles in fabric resist odors. Mesh panels at sides and arms promote cooling airflow where needed. UPF 50+ sun protection. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD Sleeveless T-Shirt help keep you visible.
short_description: With moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD Sleeveless men's T-shirt has all the performance qualities you want for your fast-paced workouts in hot weather.
